programme.title: Wildest Africa: Namibia: Sands of Time
programme.desc: Namibia is an arid, rough land. However, it has been inhabited for thousands of years, by people as well as animals, and shows no sign of losing popularity with either.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Nile: An African Odyssey
programme.desc: The Nile is the longest river in the world. Ancient Egypt, one of the history's most powerful civilizations, depended hugely upon it. Each year, it flooded, replenishing the fields with fertile silt. This automatic irrigation fueled Egypt's economy.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Ethiopia: Land of Extremes
programme.desc: Landlocked and surrounded by five countries, Ethiopia is one of east Africa's forgotten lands. Seemingly passive deserts in fact seethe with fire, and cloud-piercing peaks shield a secret Eden of canyons and cliff-tops teeming with life.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Zambezi: Wild Water
programme.desc: The Zambezi is one of Africa's most influential rivers. It supports some of the continent's most spectacular wildlife. However, the Zambezi's long and winding journey destroys, as well as creates.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Okavango: Water in the Desert
programme.desc: The Okavango Delta, a huge emerald oasis in the burning heart of the Kalahari desert, is fed by the Okavango River and this perpetual cycle of wet and dry is the lifeblood of this extraordinary natural Eden.

programme.title: Labyrinth
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old Sarah must solve a labyrinth to rescue her baby brother when he is taken by the Goblin King.

programme.title: Monte Carlo
programme.desc: Grace becomes a princess when a summer trip to Paris turns into the fantasy of a lifetime.

programme.title: Redemption
programme.desc: Ex-soldier Joseph Smith comes home from war but has been left disturbed by his experiences. Despite his intentions to start a new life, he becomes caught up in the criminal underworld, where he plots revenge on his friend's killer.

programme.title: Racket Girls
programme.desc: A plastic surgeon (played by Neil Connery, brother of Sean), the brother of a secret agent, combats villain Thair Beta.

programme.title: Deadly Women

programme.title: Deadly Women

programme.title: Deadly Women
programme.desc: We want to believe that all women would give their lives to protect their children. But there are horrifying cases when a mother will turn against her natural instinct and kill her own flesh and blood.

programme.title: Deadly Women

programme.desc: Photography has long been a vital tool in homicide investigations. A single image captures enough information to identify a suspect, and to preserve a vital clue long after a witness' memory fades.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Coroner's Casebook
programme.desc: A good coroner provides what's necessary to solve a crime. A bad one can spoil an otherwise rock-solid case. Cyril Wecht and Henry Lee, two of the country's most respected coroners, share their cases and insights into crime solving.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: One of the chefs changes teams and each team must prepare three lobster dishes in an hour. Another chef faces elimination and has to leave at the end of the day.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The remaining six chefs must turn leftovers into meals in 30 minutes, and the winning team gets a chance for revenge on chef Ramsay. Poor communication may signal the end for one contestant.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay combines the remaining five chefs into one team; the chefs must compete head-to-head with individual dishes to impress trendsetters. Two contestants have a heated power-struggle and chef Ramsay makes a heartfelt offer.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The remaining three chefs must transform classic American dishes into entres worthy of fine dining; the contestants' mothers vote on their favourite entres without knowing who made them; chef Ramsay chooses the two finalists.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The final two chefs design and run their own restaurant.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay brings in helping hands to staff the dinner service in the final challenge; tempers flare between competitors; the winner becomes the new head chef of one of Ramsay's Las Vegas restaurants.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel continues the transformation of a beat up '55 Oldsmobile into a classic custom and takes on a Henry J chop top. Part 2 of 2.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel makes the ultimate shop van out of a 1949 International milk truck.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel transforms a 1948 Packard into a street cruising led sled.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel let's loose on an abandoned 70's trike kit and works his magic to turn the naysayers into believers.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel takes on a 1923 C-Cab and a client with hoarder tendencies. Pulling out all the stops, Ian attempts to create a vintage style tow truck.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel transforms a mini-kit van into a crazy utility vehicle.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The group that attacked the Andromeda during the first Commonwealth charter signing returns to wreak more havoc.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Dark Backward
programme.desc: Trance runs through a number of different scenarios, trying to find one in which her crewmates don't die.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Risk-All Point
programme.desc: A more powerful Andromeda ship explodes due to likely sabotage, forcing Dylan's crew to save them.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Right Horse
programme.desc: Beka endangers both her crew and an entire planet when a former love shows up.

programme.title: Andromeda: What Happens to a Rev Deferred?
programme.desc: The Andromeda receives a cry for help from Rev Bam.

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: Our new team of Sensing Murder psychics are challenged to unmask the killer or killers of vivacious New Zealand hairdresser Paula Brown who was plucked from Sydneys downtown after a night out with friends.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Walk of Innocence
programme.desc: In 1970, eighteen-year-old Olive Waiker disappeared as she walked across Rotorua to babysit her nieces and nephews. Her semi-naked body was found hours later in a rest area south of the city..

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Without Warning
programme.desc: This weeks episode of Sensing Murder promises greater co-operation between psychics and police, attempting to uncover the truth about the death of 18-year-old apprentice plumber Regan ODonoghue, who was killed in a hit and run in 2007.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Looking for Justice
programme.desc: This week, for the first time ever, the prime suspect in a murder enquiry has turned to Sensing Murder for help.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: When The Trail Goes Cold
programme.desc: This episodes involves the disappearance of 62-year-old Kaye Stewart, a woman who went missing while on a short walk on June 13th, 2005.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Cop Killer: The Winchester Assassination
programme.desc: The highest ranking police officer in Australia to be murdered, Assistant Federal Police Commissioner Colin Winchester was shot twice in the head at point blank range as he was getting out of his car outside his Deakin home on 10 January 1989.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: A Killer Amongst Us: The Norfolk Island Murder
programme.desc: On Easter Sunday 2002, on sleepy Norfolk Island in the south west Pacific, the body of 29-year-old Janelle Patton was found lying in an open field.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Kimberley Killer
programme.desc: Seven years after the disappearance of baby Azaria Chamberlain at Ayers rock, long before the murder of Peter Falconio on a remote stretch of highway in the Australian outback and two years before Ivan Milat begins his reign of backpacker murders.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Gonzales Family Murders
programme.desc: On July 10, 2001, Sef Gonzales murdered his sister Clodine, 18, mother Mary Loiva Josephine, 43, and his father Teddy, 46, in their North Ryde home.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Disappearance of Donald Mackay
programme.desc: A small group of local criminals with mafia connections were making vast fortunes in the famous NSW Riverina irrigation district from marijuana plantations.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Reality Bites
programme.desc: Meg and Claire discover more about Becky's home life when she temporarily returns to work at her parents' truck stop.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Pride And Joy
programme.desc: A feral bull is wreaking havoc at Drovers Run and Tess trades in her cappuccino machine for a daily cow.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Stir Crazy
programme.desc: Tess introduces Claire to chat rooms. Jodi finds her mother in bed with Terry. A wild stallion lures Blaze away, and Claire calls the Ryans to help recapture her.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Into The Woods
programme.desc: Feral pigs have attacked Roy as well as sheep and cattle, so Claire, Becky and the Ryans go hunting. Meg feels awkward about having Terry over now that Jodi knows about them.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Haunted
programme.desc: The pain of dealing with loss grips the women of Drovers Run and each are forced to examine events - some old, some new - and find a way to deal with these emotional life-altering events.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters
programme.desc: MEG struggles to cope with the reality of JODIs coming of age and during the ensuing surprise party relationships are put to the test.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Tigner, the president of Kendall-Jackson Wine Estates, the second largest family owned wine company in the world, goes undercover posing as a grocery store employee who is pursuing his dream job in the wine industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Bernt Bodal is the CEO of American Seafoods, one of the largest seafood companies in the United States. He is going undercover to look for ways for the company to grow.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Lynne Zappone, the Chief Talent Officer of Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen, a restaurant chain that generates more than $2 billion in annual revenue, goes undercover posing as a participant in a reality show called Job Swap.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Silva became CEO of Checkers & Rallys fast food restaurants five years ago, and immediately focused on growing the business at any cost. So he is going undercover to find even more ways to drive sales and please his guests.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Kristen Flynn, the boss of Premiere Van Lines. Shes a woman with a formidable reputation. Her own staff call her Frugal Flynn because she watches the pennies to protect profit.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Stacey Mowbray, CEO of Canadas largest specialty coffee company goes undercover and gets into the grind serving lattes to get an edge on customer service and revive her connection with frontline workers.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Children in the Attic

programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Who's the Boss
programme.desc: When can a bounty hunt also be a date? When Dog and Beth decide to ride in the same SUV as they pursue a run away fugitive, will their different approaches to the investigation lead to a capture and romance?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bus Stop Bruiser
programme.desc: When an alleged abuser goes on the lame, Dog gathers the team to bring him in. As the leads grow colder Dog's determination only grows stronger. Finally, a hot lead comes in and Dog sets the trap for his prey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Luck Be A Lady
programme.desc: Dog and company head to the Big Island in pursuit of two courthouse no-shows only to find that one of them appears to be posting status updates from Southern California.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Behind the Hunt
programme.desc: The cameras are turned around, as we get a tour of life "behind the scenes" on Dog the Bounty Hunter. Using interviews with Dog and the posse, the TV crew, and never before seen footage, this is one of most revealing and heartfelt episodes of the series.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: God Looks on the Heart
programme.desc: This fugitive spells trouble for Dog in today's hunt. When the leads grow cold it's the US Postal Service to the rescue as a mail carrier lends a helping hand. Dog's team surrounds the suspected safe house and silently awaits their prey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Brother
programme.desc: Today's case involves a Samoan so Dog knows that the runner's close-knit kinfolk hold the keys to bringing him in. Dog's plan is to convince family that everyone is best served if the fugitive mans up and takes care of business.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mid-Course Correction
programme.desc: Dog's target for today was once an upstanding member of his community. Now with no home, no job and the law on his trail, this middle-aged exile from middle-class society is using the cold end of an ice pipe to soothe his troubled soul.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Baby's Back in Town
programme.desc: Dog tries to nab a fugitive, named Wayne, by calling and telling him that he's won a new vacuum cleaner and he should stick around to get it. Dog then sends his daughter, Lyssa, to "deliver" the vacuum cleaner and lure Wayne out of his house.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Surprise! Surprise!
programme.desc: Dog and his team are out to revoke bail on Eugene, a chronic heroin addict. They find him in a squalid apartment with a huge stockpile of syringes, and they can see that his physical condition is deteriorating.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Be a Lady
programme.desc: Sadie, has a homecoming dance coming up, but Willie doesn't approve of her dress selection. Willie decides to take Sadie out to find her a new "appropriate" dress.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Ring Around the Redneck
programme.desc: Though Jase lost his wedding ring long ago, Missy decides it's time for Jase to replace it with a new one. When Jase is duck hunting, once again, he loses the ring.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bass Man Standing
programme.desc: The Duck Commander team is invited to unveil a wing of the local Bass Pro shop that will feature their products.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Battle of the Brothers
programme.desc: Willie's suspicious behavior from dyeing his beard to buying a new motorcycle, makes Jase come to the conclusion that Willie is having a mid-life crisis.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Aloha, Robertsons!
programme.desc: After all their hard work, Willie decides to take the entire Robertson clan on a family vacation to Hawaii. But Willie's daily itinerary for the trip gets constantly undermined by the family's desire to participate in their own island activities.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Till Duck Do Us Part
programme.desc: Everyone comes together to plan a surprise wedding for Phil and Kay, setting up a special ceremony on their land, which the whole family attends. Si distracts Phil and Kay by taking them on a "trip down memory lane".

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: So You Think You Can Date?
programme.desc: After discovering that Martin has to miss a Friday night poker game for a date, the guys (as well as their wives) take turns figuring out the best way to coach him for romance. When babysitting for Jep and Jessica turns into a rocky road.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hot Tub Grime Machine
programme.desc: The guys realize that Godwin has never really asked them for a favor, even though they are all always helping each other out. Godwin asks them to help him get a hot tub, so they set out to help him pick one up.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A-Jase-ent Living
programme.desc: Due to construction at Jase and Missy's house, Willie and Korie invite Jase and the kids to live with them while Missy is out of town visiting friends. Then, what begins in the duck call room as a series of "Gentlemen's Bets".

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: In southeastern British Columbia, Nelson Search and Rescue is rescuing an overly curious canine whos tumbled off a cliff.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Kent-Harrison Search and Rescue deal with darkness and death on a late night callout.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Parks Canada Search and Rescue deal with injured hikers and bad news bears.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: In Southeastern British Columbia, Columbia Valley Search and Rescue scour the rugged backcountry for a missing field researcher.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: On Vancouver Islands challenging 75 kilometre West Coast hiking Trail, heavy fog hinders Parks Canada rescue efforts.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: A late night mission turns strange for Penticton and Nelson Search and Rescue when the surviving witness is cuffed on an outstanding arrest warrant.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: In British Columbias Fraser Valley, Kent Harrison Search and Rescue respond to a late night SOS for missing hikers.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Military and civilian Search and Rescue team up for a major SAR exercise.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Nelson SAR is en-route to rescue a snowmobiler whos crashed and tumbled 35 metres down a mine shaft.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Penticton SAR helicopter long lines a driver off the roof of his car in the middle of an icy river.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Players Club
programme.desc: When this couple met on the internet, they instantly hit it off. Though, when Ray found out Raina was creating sexy videos for pay, he wasnt so keen. He believes that she is meeting up with her followers and having relations for more money.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Tardy for the Party
programme.desc: Dashia says William is a cheater and spends most of his money on alcohol instead of paying the bills. William says Dashia is sneaky, belittles him, has trust issues and allows her family to interfere in their relationship.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Blame It on the Alcohol
programme.desc: Nikkinba says Muriel is controlling and constantly breaking his phones. He wouldn't return Muriel's calls for days until he quit his job and said that he's leaving her to live in North Carolina. Can they settle down or will he buy a one-way ticket?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Firecracker
programme.desc: Gary claims Ebony's verbally abusive, acts like a dictator and is frustrated with her disrespectful comments. She loves Gary very much and claims to be a 'ride or die' girlfriend, but is over Gary's unmotivated, stuck in the mud ways.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Pour Up Drank
programme.desc: Floyd Stevens jealousy is leading Alqueisha Quey Benjamin to consider breaking it off. Quey is becoming an alcoholic because of his controlling ways, but Floyd has caught her in a few lies and suspects her of cheating!

programme.title: Divorce Court: Angry Woman
programme.desc: Rechene Hall and Itarous Parker have been together for over 4 years and are engaged, but Rechene doesnt trust Itarous because of his lying. Itarous claims Rechene is too immature for a relationship. Is this couple headed down the break-up aisle?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Dead Weight
programme.desc: They say opposites attract, but Betty is starting to feel weighed down by David. David is lazy and disrespectful for how broke he is all the time. Betty no longer wants to be tied down by being with someone who is always unemployed and lies about it.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Stir Crazy
programme.desc: America says that Nathaniels controlling ways has taken the relationship to the point of no return. Nathaniel says shes always flirting with other men and even coming home with a hickies.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Young Love
programme.desc: Anissa and Malik have been together for 9 years and they have endured a lot of heartache due to Maliks cheating and dishonesty. Malik says hes not the same man he used to be and hes trying to keep his family together..

programme.title: Divorce Court: In and Out
programme.desc: Willard says hes getting tired of this roller coaster ride of a relationship with Cynthia and hes had just about as much as he can take with her lies and deception.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Drank Sinatra
programme.desc: Kayla's excessive drinking along with the cheating is a deal breaker from Bryan. Bryan can no longer tolerate Kayla's alcohol-fueled tantrums. She says he is controlling and doesn't put her and her child first. Can Judge Toler save this couple?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Not Man Enough
programme.desc: No matter how hard Demont tries, he's always looking up at the bar Reasha keeps raising. Demont got a promotion and relocated for work, which raised her suspicions of him cheating. Can this couple ignite the spark or is this relationship totaled?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Strip Search
programme.desc: When a stripper goes on the lam, Dog has to bring her in. It's a tough job but somebody has to do it. Thankfully for the team, Lady Luck is presiding over the posse tonight.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Year of the Dog
programme.desc: A one-hour special that looks back at 2006, one of Dog's most tumultuous years, which has included the passing of Beth's father, Dog and Beth's wedding, the tragic death of Dog's daughter Barbara.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Tender Trap
programme.desc: When Dog discovers today's prey is a notorious ladies man, he knows just how to lure him in. The trap includes a suggestive phone call, a motel rendezvous, and a crew of bounty hunters waiting in the next room ready to break up the party!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Make a Wish
programme.desc: Dog shows his love of justice and children in this poignant episode. He begins by giving encouragement to a group of handicapped children, then starting the search for Jacob, a fugitive who's abandoned his wife and children.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Vegas or Bust
programme.desc: Dog is going to be the keynote speaker at the annual Profession Bail Agents convention in Las Vegas, but before he leaves he's got to clear two cases from his docket - Heidi and Stephanie.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: One for the Road
programme.desc: Dog is a big-hearted guy. He's helping Mary Ellen, his friend and fellow bondsman, on a dangerous night hunt for a fugitive she is now regretting bailing out. He's also giving his nephew Justin a second chance to rejoin the team.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Business Issues
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Lou deal with a terrible boss and his instigating employees. Next, Lou, Froy, and Lyndah deal with a debtor with issues when they take possession of a taco truck. And Finally, Matt, Lou, and Sonia take on a big repo at a dealership and...

programme.title: Operation Repo: Instruction and Destruction
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Froy repossess an experimental concept motorcycle from a hose-wielding yuppie. Then, Froy and Sonia head to a casting agency to repossess a car from a two-faced receptionist with a special talent for four-letter words.

programme.title: Operation Repo: First Rule of Repo
programme.desc: Froy and Sonia encounter a city employee who tries to give them the boot, and a mechanic's shady scheme comes crashing down on Matt and Ronnie. With Froy still in debt to Sonia, an RO's offer to make a quick buck convinces Froy to break the first rule.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Man and the Bragging Snafu Episode
programme.desc: When Nick's colleague at the station encourages him to send Lindsey and Kevin to a private school, Nick and Suzanne look into it, only to be misled about the process.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Suzanne Theft Auto Episode
programme.desc: Suzanne becomes overly consumed with Kevin's science project. Elsewhere, Lindsey revs up for driving lessons, only to emerge as a suspect when her mother's car is scratched.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Despicable E Episode
programme.desc: Lindsey's romantic attentions turn to a young celebrity DJ, who only neglects her in return. Elsewhere, Suzanne teaches Kevin the art of doing laundry. Michael Strahan and Lil JJ guest star.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The She Got Game Night Episode
programme.desc: When the Kingston-Persons decide to have a game night, all bets are off, as unlikely friends are drawn to one another when paired together for games.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Valentine's Day Episode
programme.desc: Nick flops in his efforts to help Kevin with Valentine's Day at school.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Parent Teacher Trap Episode
programme.desc: Suzanne serves on a committee at Kevin's school, but complications arise when her fellow female members disrespect her---but adore Nick.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Whose Card Is It Anyway Episode
programme.desc: When Nick misleads Suzanne about spending a gift card, the couple appear before a TV judge to sort out the truth.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Suzanne Gets One-Upped Episode
programme.desc: Nick plans a belated surprise honeymoon for Suzanne, but keeping it a secret causes complications. Elsewhere, Lindsey helps Kevin with his homework.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: Don't Get Ugly
programme.desc: A mogul investor makes a big offer to buy the place for one point five million dollars. (S3, ep15)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: Head In The Clouds
programme.desc: Leah and Jeremy attempt to get away by themselves, but mother nature has different plans. (S3, ep16)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: Twin It To Win It
programme.desc: Anastasia's twin sister comes to visit, but not everyone is happy about it. (S3, ep17)

programme.title: Paranormal State: Ghosts of the Forgotten
programme.desc: The PRS investigation into the haunted Lake County Poor House becomes a journey through one PRS team members? troubled past.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Devil in Jersey
programme.desc: PRS delves deep into the pine barrens of the Garden State to separate myth from reality about the so-called "Jersey Devil." Accompanied by a cryptozoologist the team interviews eye witnesses and experts in search of the truth.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Basement
programme.desc: A history of violence may connect the spiritual activity in Heidi's Ohio home to a long run of misery and cruelty.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Monuments & Landmarks
programme.desc: Many of the worlds most significant manmade wonders serve not as dwellings, but as powerful signposts. But more than giving us direction, they tell us a story - they characterize powerful forces, or commemorate power lost.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Port Cities
programme.desc: Some of the most stunning cities are port cities - Sydney, Rio, Cape Town - and are also some of the most culturally diverse and vibrant. The great maritime cities of the world bridge countries and continents and unite the global community.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Grassland Animals
programme.desc: Grasslands are the great stages of the natural world where large animals play out spectacular lives in clear view of people, including lions, leopards, elephants, rhinoceros, cheetahs, impalas, kangaroos, wallaby, potoroo, bison, and wolves.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Mega Cities
programme.desc: Mega Cities provide a bustling home to populations of over 10 million. Travel from the high-density living of Shanghai and Bangkok to the sprawling cities of Delhi and Mexico City, each the backdrop for dynamic cultures.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Marine Animals
programme.desc: From the surprises of colorful reef characters to effervescent penguins, killer sharks, and regal whales, dive into the places where nature reveals itself in some of its most marvelous and bizarre forms.

programme.title: Arthur: Grandma Thora Appreciation Day/Fern's Slumber Party
programme.desc: Arthur and D.W. are planning a surprise party for Grandma Thora. But amidst the party-planning mayhem, they forget about the guest of honor! Then, shy Fern hosts a slumber party at her mother's urging.

programme.title: Arthur: Buster's Green Thumb/My Fair Tommy
programme.desc: Buster finds out that his collection of old food makes excellent compost--which makes for even better tomatoes! Then, neither of the Tibble twins has ever won the coveted "Good Behavior of the Week" cupcake award.

programme.title: Arthur: Lights, Camera...Opera!/All Worked Up
programme.desc: When Muffy's Dad gives her concert tickets, she couldn't be more excited--until she discovers that she's going to the opera. And Arthur aced five quizzes in a row! But his luck runs out when Mom takes a new job.

programme.title: Arthur: The Lousy Week/You Are Arthur
programme.desc: An army of lice has descended on the heads of Lakewood Elementary. Who or what is strong enough to defeat them? What if you could be Arthur for a day? View Arthur's life through his very own eyes for this special episode.

programme.title: Arthur: Meek For A Week/Arthur, World's Greatest Gleeper
programme.desc: Muffy bets Francine she can't be nice to everyone for a whole week--and soon wishes she hadn't. Next, Arthur didn't mean to tell a lie, he just got stuck in a sort of fib, because he thought it was cool to be a Gleeper.

programme.title: Arthur: Castles in the Sky/Tipping the Scales
programme.desc: The gang is devastated after their tree house collapses. Can architect Frank Gehry help them to rebuild? Everyone in Arthur's chorus group is excited about their upcoming performance in Crown City.

programme.title: Arthur: The Contest/Prove It
programme.desc: What would happen if Arthur and his friends entered a contest to write stories for their favorite TV show? Then, look out world, D.W. has discovered science! But D.W.'s new-found passion proves that a little knowledge is a dangerous thing.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W., The Picky Eater/Buster And The Daredevils
programme.desc: It's wrong to call D.W. a picky eater. The only things she won't eat are vegetables, fish, fruit, and meat. Then, Arthur and Buster meet two really cool kids and, naturally, are utterly dazzled. How far will Buster go to be cool?

programme.title: Arthur: Water and The Brain/Arthur The Unfunny
programme.desc: Is The Brain a snob? That seems to be the explanation for why he won't go to Waterworld with his friends. And, Arthur's a notorious joke-killer. But when he's scheduled to perform as a carnival clown, he learns how to make people laugh!

programme.title: War Story: Bomber Command: Getting Home
programme.desc: In this film, Bomber Command personnel and a Luftwaffe pilot take the viewer through the frightening reality of fighting in the skies as they try to get a damaged bomber home.

programme.title: War Story: Bomber Command: Hitting Back
programme.desc: After surviving the German bombing campaign of British cities, RAF Bomber Command struck back against Germany. The devastating consequences of raids, for both for the young men in the skies and the people on the ground, are portrayed in this film.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: Japan continues its suicidal resistance, and invading it looks costly. After 2 atomic bombs, the Emperor intervenes and stops the War. Stalin grabs territory in East Asia. The War is over, and the Atomic Era and the Cold War start.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: In 1945, Germany is crumbly on both fronts. The Western Allies cross the Rhine and take most of Germany, while the Red Army quickly advances into Berlin. After Hitler's suicide, Germany surrenders and is divided among the allied powers.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: The Marines succeed in the "island hopping" strategy against suicidal resistance. The US Navy establishes supremacy, cutting off Japan.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: The Western Allies secure supply routes that will allow them to enter Germany, and the Ardennes counter-offensive fails. The Red Army advances rapidly. The SS implements the Holocaust.

programme.title: Catfish UK: Angelica & Jeroen
programme.desc: Angelica's been speaking to Jeroen online for three and a half years. After several failed attempts to meet, she's now desperate to find out if Jeroen is real? (S2, ep5)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Dorion & Jeszica
programme.desc: Dorion is about to give up everything for online love Jeszica, including his relationship with girlfriend Raffinee. But first he wants to know, is Jeszica really the girl in the pictures?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Tracie & Sammie
programme.desc: Tracie Thoms had a connection with a fan named 'Sammie' after hearing about the passing of Sammie's friend. Sammie suddenly disappeared and now Tracie is left wondering who Sammie really is?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Brendan loves McKenna, but failed attempts to connect have left him wondering if McKenna is for real. Nev teams with social media sensation Karrueche Tran to help Brendan uncover the truth. (S5, ep4)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Daisy & Marcus
programme.desc: Daisy met Marcus on Instagram and he instantly stole her heart. But Marcus won't speak to Daisy on the phone, let alone meet her in person, so Nev and Tyler try to arrange a face to face.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Long Islander Catherine has fallen deeply in love with country boy Graham from Tennessee. She's ready to uproot her life to be a country girl with him, but Nev and Max uncover that Graham's not everything he claims to be.

programme.title: The City: Working Girls
programme.desc: Whitney wonders if working with a friend is a good idea when Roxy steps out of line on day one. Olivia wins Joe Zee's approval on a new project at ELLE, but Erin isn't impressed. (S1, ep15)

programme.title: The City: Its All Who You Know
programme.desc: Whitney goes behind Kelly's back to show her fashion designs to Bergdorf Goodman. Olivia shocks Erin by using her fashion world connections to succeed at her biggest ELLE task. (S1, ep16)

programme.title: The City: Meet the Fackelmayers
programme.desc: Whitney meets some cute brothers. Olivia thrives at an ELLE Magazine cocktail party &amp; Erin reminds her that the fashion business isn't just about who you know but what you know. (S1, ep17)

programme.title: The City: Hit It And Quit It
programme.desc: Whitney grows cautious about Freddie just as her ex, Jay, comes back into the picture. Roxy clashes with Olivia when People's Revolution and Elle join forces to put on a party. (S1, ep18)

programme.title: The City: Weekend at Freddie's
programme.desc: On a weekend trip to the Hamptons, Whitney finds out some surprising news about Freddie. Erin has to pick up the slack when Olivia drops the ball on a big interview assignment. (S1, ep19)

programme.title: The City: Friends And Foe-Workers
programme.desc: When Whitney fights with Roxy at Miami Fashion Week, Kelly questions if they should work together. Erin expects Joe to come down hard on Olivia, but things don't go as she hoped. (S1, ep20)

programme.title: The City: Forget About Boys
programme.desc: Whitney and Roxy go on a series of dates ending in a blow-up at a club. When Olivia gets preferential treatment on a photoshoot, Erin reveals the real reasons she dislikes Olivia. (S1, ep21)

programme.title: The City: If You Want Something Done Right...
programme.desc: Whitney lets Roxy work on a big project, even though Kelly thinks Roxy can't be trusted. When Olivia comes up short for a new assignment, she and Erin have a huge fight. (s1, ep22)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Three Men and a Snooki
programme.desc: Deena panics after missing her period. After an all-night fight with Jionni, Snookie decides to take a break from the relationship. Mike tries to win her over, but someone else ends up comforting her.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Tacoma Confidential
programme.desc: A report on corruption and a cover-up by city officials of Tacoma, Washington, focusing on David Brame, the citys police chief who rose to power despite a shady past.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Decades of Deceit
programme.desc: An Internet-savvy investigator works to solve a decades-old murder case.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A report about the 2015 showdown between two millionaires, Robert Dahl and Emad Tawfilis, whose bitter money dispute over a Napa Valley winery business ended in murder.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Millionaire Boys Club
programme.desc: 48 Hours is television's most popular true-crime series, investigating shocking cases and compelling real-life dramas with journalistic integrity and cutting-edge style.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Getting Away with Murder?
programme.desc: A report on families who have experienced the violent death of a loved one and believe they know the identity of the killer but lack evidence to back the charge.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: The Bear Facts/Nothing To Be Afraid/The Big Talker
programme.desc: Garfield runs into a bear and Binky./The crew try to find one item that Wade will not be afraid of./Garfield makes a local talk show host regret his anti-cat comments.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Star Struck/Election Daze/Dirty Business
programme.desc: Garfield writes his own script for the show./The weasel convinces Roy to suggest an election./Jon visits his cousin Berferd.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Irwin the Mouse wants to be cast and Garfield lets him be one. Wade visits the Sage on a mountain to see how to overcome his fears.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Moo Cow Mutt/ Big Bad Buddy Bird/Angel Puss
programme.desc: Garfield tricks Odie into thinking he's a cow./Roys agent get him a new job on the Buddy Bear's show./An angel tries to stop Garfield from being mean to Odie.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Jon tries to sell Garfield as a cartoon series. The vegetables Wade is guarding disappear.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Odie finds a genie and is granted his wish to fly. A witch decides Jon will be her husband.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: A fast-talking salesman cons Jon. CatTV airs the latest video, Thats Called Bein A Cat.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: The Pizza Patrol/U.S Acres: The Son Also Rises/Rolling Romance
programme.desc: Garfield tries to get free pizza./Wade's father comes to the farm./Jon's new car falls in love with him.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: To impress a girl, Jon takes her to see a dangerous game show.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Jons niece has to be retrieved by Garfield and Odie. Garfield gets confidence from a motivational speaker.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Decoy
programme.desc: Phelps falls in love with a woman that the IMF has been assigned to bring out of an iron curtain country over the seemingly insurmountable obstacles set in their way by the country's secret police in the "Decoy"

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Flight
programme.desc: John Colicos guest stars as a rebellious Caribbean government official, who plans to take over his country by having his president assassinated while in the United States to speak before a joint session of Congress

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Hunted
programme.desc: While rescuing an imprisoned patriot, Barney is critically wounded and must be left behind in order for the IMF to complete their mission in the "Hunted" episode of Paramount Television's "Mission: Impossible."

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Amateur
programme.desc: Before the IMF can get the prototype of an Iron Curtain country's secret weapon to the United States, part of the weapon falls into the hands of an unscrupulous, greedy nightclub owner, in "The Amateur"

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Catafalque
programme.desc: With the threat of another off-shore missile crisis and perhaps a confrontation that could lead to war, the IMF is called upon to expose a nuclear arms treaty secretly signed by a previously friendly country and a hostile power in "The Catafalque"

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: When Riff is asked to be captain of a baseball team, he doesnt think he can do it. But Barney gives him the courage to try.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Rabbits - Listen
programme.desc: BJ is pretending to be a great detective. But all great detectives need a mystery to solve! One quickly comes his way when an animal nibbles on one of Baby Bop's healthy snacks.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: My Friends the Doctor
programme.desc: Time for a check-up! Barney helps his friends discover the world of doctors and dentists as they learn about healthy habits like brushing teeth, getting checkups, eating healthy foods and getting exercise.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: All Aboard
programme.desc: Kami, one of Barney's youngest friends, has trouble keeping up with the other kids and she's tired of always being last. She's not having a very good day.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Ahora Mismo!
programme.desc: When Ben arrives too late to get a pony ride he must learn how to wait the hard way. He's always wanted a horse and now it looks as if he's missed his opportunity. Luckily, Barney takes him to Spain where they meet Regalo, a dancing horse!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: A-Counting We Will Go!
programme.desc: Barney and the kids help Baby Bop count to ten by playing games, and visiting a Make-Believe Market.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Bonjour Barney!

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Second Chances
programme.desc: A Taelon program offers a transformation into a younger, healthier version of oneself. Liam fears that something more dangerous is also happening. Lili is worried that Doors' run for the presidency is negatively affecting the resistance.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Payback
programme.desc: A mysterious death by poisoning creates questions about the safety of portal technology. When a Taelon is killed in the same manner, the investigation leads to a very smart scientist that even the Resistance was scared to work with.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Friendly Fire
programme.desc: Paul Chandler plots an attack on the Taelon Embassy in DC with the ship he stole from Lili. He begs her to join him in beginning an all out war.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Volunteers
programme.desc: A group of Resistance capture a volunteer from a Taelon program for youth. Liam decides they may learn valuable information from her. They also decide to send in one of their own as a volunteer to see what the program is teaching.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Bliss
programme.desc: Lili is given a psychotropic drug called "bliss" via a Taelon device. They discover it is widespread. With an instantly strong addictive property, the addicts are dying within 48 hours. The investigation leads Liam and Sandoval to Ireland.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Highjacked
programme.desc: With a reporter on board, the Taelon mother ship is highjacked into interdimensional space. Liam is the prime suspect, causing an even bigger rift between Da'an and Zo'or. As the ship floats, lost in space, they must find the real culprit.

programme.title: The Lost World: Absolute Power
programme.desc: A powerful light ray from an ancient temple knocks Professor Challenger unconscious. As the explorers try and save him, he occupies an alternate reality in his mind where he has godlike powers.

programme.title: The Lost World: Camelot
programme.desc: In the process of trying to save Marguerite from being betrothed to a teenage king, Malone must face a T-Rex with only a sword and Roxton must joust against Vordred.

programme.title: The Lost World: Unnatural Selection
programme.desc: Challenger comes face to face with an old friend from England, Dr. William Hargrove. Summerlee, Malone, and Marguerite agree to help the Queen of the nymphs and fairies break a curse.

programme.title: The Lost World: Time After Time
programme.desc: While hunting, Roxton and Veronica come across two individuals from the future. One becomes keen on using Marguerite to lead him to riches, and the other is set on stopping that from happening.

programme.title: The Lost World: Prodigal Father
programme.desc: The explorers find trouble when they help save and aid a man they believe is Veronica's long lost father on the run from Kartas, a bounty hunter.

programme.title: The Lost World: Birthright
programme.desc: Summerlee, Roxton, and Veronica must outrun a T-rex that's tracking them for dinner. Meanwhile Marguerite, Malone, and Challenger are manipulated by Ramses to help him take his place as pharaoh.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip

programme.title: Catfish UK: Mario & Hannah
programme.desc: After turning his life around, Mario met his soulmate, Hannah. But she refuses to speak on the phone and won't meet in person. Julie and Oobah try to find out who his dream girl really is. (S1, ep7)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Neil & Jasmin
programme.desc: Neil has been chatting to Jasmin for 3 years and she's stood him up 13 times. So it's up to Julie and Oobah to find out if the person Neil has fallen for...is real? (S1, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Tasheeka & Aaron
programme.desc: After avoiding video calls for 2 years, Tasheeka is desperate to find out if Aaron is her Prince Charming. It's up to Julie and Oobah to see if this online romance has a fairy tale ending. (S1, ep3)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Emma & Harry
programme.desc: After six months, single mum Emma and online love Harry have already set a wedding date. But the problem is, they've never met. So it's up to the Catfish UK team to track him down. (S1, ep8)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: Relationship Woes

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: Be My Valentine

programme.title: 48 Hours: Love, Hate & Obsession
programme.desc: In the investigation of the murder of a one-time millionaire, both his ex-wife and his son are suspects.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Black Dahlia Confidential
programme.desc: The brutal murder in 1947 of Elizabeth Short, a young, struggling actress whose body was discovered in a vacant lot in January 1947, has baffled the Los Angeles Police Department for decades

programme.title: 48 Hours: Live to Tell: One Last Hug
programme.desc: An updated report on growing dangers of dating and breakup violence, focusing on Melissa Dohme, who agreed to meet a former boyfriend, Robert Burton, for one last hug before they broke up forever. The decision nearly cost her her life.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Endgame
programme.desc: Janet Levine March, a wife and mother of two young children, disappeared on August 15, 1996. In December 2004, a grand jury indicted her husband, Perry, for her murder, based on circumstantial evidence.

programme.title: 48 Hours: House of Secrets
programme.desc: In September 2006, Kathy Wangler, wife of anesthesiologist Dr. Mark Wangler, died from carbon monoxide poisoning in their home. Their 30-year marriage had been falling apart; In 2009, investigators concluded that Dr. Wangler had murdered his wife.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Death Wish
programme.desc: A report surrounding the July 2009 death of Jeffrey Locker, whose body was found slumped over the steering wheel of his car in Harlem, New York. When authorities tracked Lockers ATM card to Kenneth Minor, Minor said Locker had begged Minor to kill him.
